patch 7.4.1469
Problem:    Channel test sometimes fails, especially on OS/X. (Kazunobu
            Kuriyama)
Solution:   Change the && into ||, call getsockopt() in more situations.
            (Ozaki Kiichi)

            misintepreted.
Solution:   Convert CSI to K_CSI. (SungHyun Nam)
